subject: Basketball
Knees
lead_paragraph: Tracy McGrady is nearing the end of a 29-game tryout, his future obscured by last year’s knee surgery, a prolonged layoff and the uncertainty shrouding the Knicks’ roster.
snippet: Tracy McGrady is nearing the end of a 29-game tryout, his future obscured by last year’s knee surgery, a prolonged layoff and the uncertainty shrouding the Knicks’ roster.
